title: “Unfavourable effects of medically indicated oral anticoagulants on survival in idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis.” Michael Kreuter, Marlies S. Wijsenbeek, Martina Vasakova, Paolo Spagnolo, Martin Kolb, Ulrich Costabel, Derek Weycker, Klaus-Uwe Kirchgaessler and Toby M. Maher.Eur Respir J2016; 47: 1776–1784.
